title: SEC Now (New Episode)
overview: The flagship news and information program of the SEC Network -- ESPN's 24/7 multiplatform sports network devoted to the Southeastern Conference -- is SEC Now, broadcast weekdays from the network's studios in Charlotte, N.C. Hosted by Dari Nowkhah, the show includes a mix of sports coverage, in-depth features, insider access, and exclusive interviews with the movers and shakers of the conference's 14 teams.
